en-US.name: Appointment Scheduler
en-US.summary: This skil lets users schedule an appointment.
en-US.description:
This skil lets users request an appointment.

To use this skill you'll need to enable profile permissions in the Alexa compainion app. If you need any assistants using this skill or if you any suggestions, please email us.

Thank you!

locales.testingInstructions: This skill was built using the Appointment Scheduler Template.
